title: Ez eazy
body:
I am just curious, as an adult I find it very strange that kids say 'ez 'eazy' all the time.

Even when the game is close they say 'ez' are they mentally slow?

As an older gamer I try and be polite and say 'good game' but it seems kids, even adult (possibly mentally retarded) keep saying 'ez'

I am guessing the kids are slow and the adults that say 'ez' live in their mothers house but to me it is strange.

Either way, I win.

replies.body: it's an assholes remark, they say it when someone made a mistake/dc and they won because of it

I've been reporting ggez duds since I saw a thread with a rioter agreeing that it was reportable. Just gives me a reason to report people that I don't like. You'll never know the mentality behind them unless your one yourself though. Some people are egotistical, some are sadistical and seeing rage after one of those comments makes them feel absolutely fan****ingtastic. It's just some random pop culture thing now like how selfie was added to the dictionary. They're not slow, I don't even think those pokemongo players who stop their car in the middle of the road or come into my backyard are slow. And yea you do win. you think therefore you are :P have fun

I must admit maybe it does have something to do with school holidays.

Played a game just now, we had one AFK'er the whole game yet the other team felt the urge to say 'ez' after the match was over.

At least now I know it's reportable I guess I will stop getting baited and abusing them and just report them instead.

While variants of "ez" are straight up annoying and unnecessary, especially when it follows a close game that they clearly didn't find easy, I wouldn't say the people who write it are slow. Mean-spirited, troll or insecure, they just want you to feel bad. It's just as "ez" to take the high road, appreciate the fact you don't stoop to such petty business and potentially send a report if you feel the need to.

toxic kids everywhere in this server. you can actually feel the differences in school holiday. Then, think yourself or ask your friends about how people actually teach their kids in OCEANIA?  I said "in OCEANIA" because I believe most players in this server are from OCEANIA.
It's good bait if it is.
